method.name: EnrollStop
method.description: Stop an on-going fingerprint enrollment started with EnrollStart.

method.name: VerifyStart

arg.name: bid
arg.description: Biometrics ID to verify against. Must have been previously enrolled with a device compatible to the device selected to perform the scan.

method.description: Performs a new scan and verify it against a previously enrolled print.

method.name: VerifyStop
method.description: Stop an on-going fingerprint verification started with VerifyStart.

method.name: IdentifyStart

arg.name: bids
arg.description: A biometrics ID set to identify against. Must have been previously enrolled with a device compatible to the device selected to perform the scan.

method.description: Performs a new scan and attempts to identify the scanned finger against a collection of previously enrolled fingerprints.

method.name: IdentifyStop
method.description: Stop an on-going fingerprint identification started with IdentifyStart.

arg.name: bid
arg.description: Biometrics ID associate with finger data. Only valid if result is FP_ENROLL_RESULT_COMPLETE.

arg.name: result
arg.description: Represent the status of the enrollment. Refer to enum FPEnrollResult in biometrics-i.h.

arg.name: progress
arg.description: A number between 1 and 100 to describe the progress of enrolling fingerprint.

arg.name: result
arg.description: Represent the status of the verification. Refer to enum FPVerifyResult in biometrics-i.h.

arg.name: bid
arg.description: The matched fingerprint. Only valid if result is FP_VERIFY_RESULT_MATCH.

arg.name: result
arg.description: Represent the status of the identification. Refer to enum FPVerifyResult in biometrics-i.h.
